attributes.action: Replace the National Assembly for Wales with a proper Welsh Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
Even with full law making powers in the devolved areas, the National Assembly for Wales still isn't a proper devolved Parliament for the people of Wales.

We propose that the National Assembly for Wales is replaced with a full Welsh Parliament / Senedd Cymru, with control over all areas of the existing 20 devolved fields and full/limited taxation powers.
